resources.string: This sample app will attempt to make a request to a web service. The request will succeed only if SafetyNet attests that the device is CTS compatible.

This application demonstrates how developers can use SafetyNet, part of Google Play Services, in order to understand the CTS compatibility status of the device.\r\n\r\nFor more information please visit https://www.cigital.com/blog/using-safetynet-api
